resources.string: Shogi gratis para todos, para sempre!
Sen anuncios nin subscricións; só código aberto e paixón.
Tes unha conta de Patrón Vitalicia. Impresionante!
Tes unha conta de Patrón ata o %s.
Se non se renova, a túa conta reverterase a unha conta normal.
Contamos co apoio de persoas coma ti para facelo posible. Se desfrutas usando Lishogi, por favor considera apoiarnos doando e facéndote Patrón!
Se queres apoiar Lishogi e o desenvolvemento de código aberto, considera doar! Non obterás nada a cambio, pois Lishogi trata a todos os usuarios por igual. Claro que a túa doazón agradécese moito!
Paga %s unha vez. Sé un Patrón de Lishogi para sempre!
Facturación recorrente, renovando as túas ás de Patrón cada mes.
Unha única doazón que che concede as ás de Patrón durante un mes.
Please enter an amount in USD
We are a small team, so your support makes a huge difference!
The celebrated Patrons who make Lishogi possible
Can I change/cancel my monthly support?
Yes, at any time, from this page. Or you can %s.
Are some features reserved to Patrons?
No, because Lishogi is entirely free, forever, and for everyone. That\'s a promise. However, Patrons get bragging rights with a cool new profile icon.
You support lishogi.org with %s per month.
Thank you very much for your help. You rock!
Decide what Lishogi is worth to you:
Withdraw your credit card and stop payments:
Your transaction has been completed, and a receipt for your donation has been emailed to you.
You now have a permanent Patron account.
You are now a lifetime Lishogi Patron!
You are now a Lishogi Patron for one month!
In one month, you will NOT be charged again, and your Lishogi account will revert to a regular account.
